# Amogus
idk what is this... sus

## Installation

`pip install sus-amogus`

## Example

### Amogusify

Amogusify your text (???)

```py
import amogus

text = "This is epic"
result = amogus.amogusify(text)
# result = amogus.amogusify(text, emoji = True) # with emoji

print(result)
```
